import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Addpost = () => { const navigate=useNavigate(); const[post,setPost] = useState({title:"",description:'',urlToImage:""}); const inputHandler=(e)=>{ const {name,value} = e.target; setPost({ ...post,[name]:value }) console.log(post); } co return (
) } export default Addpost
